name: Plant Station: MICRO
description:
Tiny retro-inspired game where you collect items and grow plants.

The Earth is gone and you play as artificial intelligence traveling trough the space, trying to recover plants that not a long time ago inhabited the Earth.

CONTROLS:

  • Action - SPACE, ENTER
  • Full-screen - F
  • Menu - Q, B
  • Sound ON/OFF - M
  • Move - ARROWS, AWDS
